summary: A collection of end-to-end test suites that exercise the full RAG evaluation workflow, including adaptation of retrieval components, metric calculations (answer relevance, context precision/recall, faithfulness, harmfulness) and integration with LangChain and LangSmith services.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and stability of the RAGAS evaluation pipeline and its external integrations, providing confidence that metric computations and system adaptations work as expected before release.
